title: Retsujou no Meikyuu
sinopse:
1. Retsujou no Meikyou
   Disillusioned doctor Yuuichi is bought by a handsome stranger and is kept as a sex slave-- but the master sometimes shows surprising kindness. Just who is he?

2. Retsujou no Hazama
   Yuuichi and Takasugi's story continues. Yuuichi is having doubts about their relationship.

3-4) Retsujou no Rensa

5. Okubyou na Junjou
   A doctor has a one-sided love for one of his twin step brothers.

(Source: Manga Updates)
